original_text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!
korean_text: 손을 내밀어 제자들을 가리켜 이르시되 나의 어머니와 나의 동생들을 보라

sentences.original_text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples
and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!
sentences.korean_translation: 말하기를, 보라, 나의 어머니와 나의 형제들이 있느니라!
